channel.title: Changing Character Rights 562 [tut]
channel.description:
I know this is really simple if you know how to do it, but i've seen so many people asking how it's done. Pkzevolution 562 is the source im using in this tut, highly recommended source.
Difficulty-1/10 Files Edited-Character file
[u][b]File Location[/b][/u] Source Folder -> Data -> SavedGames -> Character file of your choice
1) First find the character file of your choice 2) Search for [code]<rights>0</rights>[/code] 3) Replace <rights>0</rights> with <rights>2</rights>
<rights>0</rights> = normal player <rights>1</rights> = moderator <rights>2</rights> = administrator <rights>3</rights> = Hidden Administrator
[u][b]Similarly if you want to give a character donator status...[/b][/u]
1) search [code]<donator>0</donator>[/code] 2) replace <donator>0</donator> with <donator>1</donator>
<donator>0</donator> = non donator <donator>1</donator> = donator status

item.title: Changing Character Rights 562 [tut]
item.dc:creator: @jobocoy2 jobocoy2
item.description:
@jobocoy2 wrote:

I know this is really simple if you know how to do it, but i’ve seen so many people asking how it’s done. Pkzevolution 562 is the source im using in this tut, highly recommended source.

Difficulty-1/10
Files Edited-Character file

File Location
Source Folder -> Data -> SavedGames -> Character file of your choice

  1. First find the character file of your choice
  2. Search for <rights>0</rights>
  3. Replace 0 with 2

0 = normal player
1 = moderator
2 = administrator
3 = Hidden Administrator

Similarly if you want to give a character donator status…

  1. search <donator>0</donator>
  2. replace 0 with 1

0 = non donator
1 = donator status

Read full topic
